head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RAPP, J.M. HOWARD, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RAPP, J.M. HOWARD, M.D.

block.p: RAPP--J.M. Howard, M.D. on January 8, 2007. Husband of the late Elsie. Devoted father of Pamela Rapp, Millicent Mahood and Douglas Rapp. Cherished grandfather of five and great-grandfather of two. A Veteran of the US Navy during WWII. He was a cardiologist specializing in cardiovascular diabetes in Auburn, NY, for 45 years. Graveside services at the Kensico Cemetery with Episcopalian blessings. For further information please call Westchester Funeral Home, Inc. 914337-4585.
